name: University of Wisconsin- Eau Claire
description:
Open.Eau Claire is a student-run initiative collaborating with faculty and staff to provide a resource that highlights the unique educational opportunities that UW - Eau Claire has to offer.

UW - Eau Claire is a Comprehensive, Master's level University that focuses on small class sizes, collaborative undergraduate research, and global learning, among many other specialties.

Year after year, our university is consistently ranked one of the top public regional universities in the Midwest in U.S.News & World Report. This impressive national ranking and many other distinctions reflect UW-Eau Claire's commitment to excellence.
